name: Homebrew
description: Install Homebrew and custom formulas (or init with `Brewfile`).

USERNAME.description: Install Homebrew under this user, defaults to `linuxbrew`. If you change this, you should also change `containerEnv` accordingly.

SHALLOW_CLONE.description: Install Homebrew using shallow clone. Shallow clone allows significant reduction in the installation size at the expense of not being able to run `brew update`, which effectively means the package index will be frozen at the moment of the image creation.

FORMULAS.description: Formulas to install once the brew is finished. (space-delimited string)

BREWFILE.description: Use this URL to download the `Brewfile` and then `brew bundle install` this `Brewfile`.

HOMEBREW_BREW_GIT_REMOTE.description: Use this URL as the Homebrew/brew remote.

HOMEBREW_CORE_GIT_REMOTE.description: Use this URL as the `Homebrew/homebrew-core` remote.

HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN.description: Use this URL as the download mirror for bottles. If bottles at that URL are temporarily unavailable, the default bottle domain will be used as a fallback mirror.

HOMEBREW_PIP_INDEX_URL.description: If set, `brew install` will use this URL to download PyPI package resources.
